targets.expr: sum by(le, job, instance)(rate(state_store_sstable_bloom_filter_size_sum[$__rate_interval]))  / sum by(le, job, instance)(rate(state_store_sstable_bloom_filter_size_count[$__rate_interval]))

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance))
histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance))
histogram_quantile(1.0, sum(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance))

sum by(le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance)(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_sum[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(le,actor_id,wait_side,job,instance) (rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_count[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Join Actor Input Blocking Time Ratio

targets.expr: sum by(le, job, instance) (rate(state_store_shared_buffer_to_l0_duration_sum[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(le, job, instance) (rate(state_store_shared_buffer_to_l0_duration_count[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(le, job, instance)(rate(state_store_range_reverse_scan_duration_sum[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(le, job, instance) (rate(state_store_range_reverse_scan_duration_count[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(le, job, instance)(rate(state_store_iter_duration_sum[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(le, job,instance) (rate(state_store_iter_duration_count[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(le, job, instance)(rate(state_store_scan_iter_duration_sum[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(le, job,instance) (rate(state_store_iter_scan_duration_count[$__rate_interval]))

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(state_store_get_key_size_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, job, instance)) + histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(state_store_get_value_size_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, job, instance))

(sum(rate(state_store_get_key_size_sum[$__rate_interval])) by(job, instance) + sum(rate(state_store_get_value_size_sum[$__rate_interval])) by(job, instance)) / (sum(rate(state_store_get_key_size_count[$__rate_interval])) by (job, instance) + sum(rate(state_store_get_value_size_count[$__rate_interval])) by (job, instance))
